payload.name: consensus-keeps-one-truth-for-critical-control-state-minimize-what-needs-consensus
payload.title: Consensus keeps one truth for critical control state; minimize what needs consensus
payload.formal: consensus replicates a state machine; cost is high, so keep the replicated state small.
payload.apm2_mapping: store bulk data in CAS; store events in ledger; replicate only the minimal “pointers” and membership state. The BFT backend exists; your future pain will be “what did we mistakenly put into consensus?” Keep it austere.
